A4.text: Suleiman I (6 September 1566), commonly known as Suleiman the Magnificent, was the Ottoman sultan from 1520 till 1566.

A5.text: After succeeding his father Selim I on 30 September 1520, Suleiman began his reign...

A6.text: Selim I was the sultan of the Ottoman Empire from 1512 to 1520.

A7.text: Bayezid II was the sultan of the Ottoman Empire from 1481 to 1512.

A8.text: Bayezid II was the son of Åžehzade Mehmed (later Mehmed II)

A9.text: Bayezid II abdicated his throne to his son, Selim I
